description: project_get_network will fail in flatdhcp mode with multiple projects, so project_get_network needs to be replaced with network_get_by_instance.
title: libvirt driver is using project_get_network instead of network_get_by_instance

comments.content: project_get_network will fail in flatdhcp mode with multiple projects, so project_get_network needs to be replaced with network_get_by_instance.
